data.prayer: Father, may the churches in Mathura, Uttar Pradesh, India honor local leaders who work hard for the flock of God.
data.verse: Pay careful attention to yourselves and to all the flock, in which the Holy Spirit has made you overseers, to care for the church of God, which he obtained with his own blood.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Mathura, Uttar Pradesh, India
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Jesus, raise up prophets and truth speakers in your church in Mathura, Uttar Pradesh, India so that the church can grow in every way into the mature body of you its head.
data.verse: Instead, speaking the truth in love, we will grow to become in every respect the mature body of him who is the head, that is, Christ.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the 28,019 believers find a person of peace today among the 2,519,181 lost neighbors around them. And help them start discovery bible studies in these unbelieving homes.
data.verse: Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor. Send to Joppa for Simon who is called Peter. He is a guest in the home of Simon the tanner, who lives by the sea.’ So I sent for you immediately, and it was good of you to come. Now we are all here in the presence of God to listen to everything the Lord has commanded you to tell us.”

data.prayer: Father, we rejoice that you who began a good work in the church of Mathura, Uttar Pradesh, India will carry it on to completion until the day of Jesus Christ!
data.verse: being confident of this, that he who began a good work in you will carry it on to completion until the day of Christ Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, open to your people a door for the word, to speak the mystery of Christ to the Brahmin Rikhisur people.
Jesus, please send your Spirit to Mathura, so they can have freedom.
data.verse: Now the Lord is the Spirit, and where the Spirit of the Lord is, there is freedom.

data.prayer: Jesus, all authority was given to you, and you commanded all disciples in Mathura, Uttar Pradesh, India to make more disciples, and you promised to be with them. May your power and their obedience make more disciples today.
data.verse: All authority in heaven and on earth has been given to me. Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age.

data.section_summary:
the county of Mathura, Uttar Pradesh, India has a population of 2,547,200.

We estimate Mathura has 28,019 people who might know Jesus, 30,906 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 2,488,275 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, please make every disciple be a disciple maker, every home a training center, and every church a church planting movement in the county of Mathura.

location.name: Mathura
location.people_groups_list: Rajput (Muslim traditions), Jat Dehia (Hindu traditions), Gadaria Nikhad, Jat Dalal (Muslim traditions), Jat Dhariwal (Muslim traditions)
